  • Method Details

    • getBaseCurrency

      Currency getBaseCurrency()
      Gets the value of the BaseCurrency field. Base currency from which currency conversion is performed. In many cases this will match with the FromCurrency field, but in cases of triangulated rate conversion this represents the base currency used to perform triangulated rate calculation
      Specified by:
      getBaseCurrency in interface FXRateContext
      Returns:
      The base currency for the foreign exchange conversion

    • getFromCurrency

      Currency getFromCurrency()
      Gets the value of the FromCurrency field. The Currency this rate converts from
      Specified by:
      getFromCurrency in interface FXRateContext
      Returns:
      The currency to be "sold"

    • getMarket

      FXRateMarket getMarket()
      Gets the value of the Market field. The FXRateMarket for which the rate applies
      Specified by:
      getMarket in interface FXRateContext
      Returns:
      The market for which the rate applies

    • getMarketTime

      Date getMarketTime()
      Gets the value of the MarketTime field. The point in time when the market indicated the rate was applicable
      Specified by:
      getMarketTime in interface FXRateContext
      Returns:
      Either the requested market time, or the point in time when the market indicated the rate was applicable

    • getRate

      BigDecimal getRate()
      Gets the value of the Rate field. The exchange spot rate at which a currency pair can be bought or sold
      Specified by:
      getRate in interface FXRate
      Returns:
      The conversion rate

      Date getRetrievedAt()
      Gets the value of the RetrievedAt field. The point in time when the quotation was obtained from an external source
      Specified by:
      getRetrievedAt in interface FXRate
      Returns:
      The time when the quotation was obtained from the market
